My interior decor style has been described as minimalistic and even a little austere, but even I contend that holiday decorations should be anything but that. Especially for the winter holidays, comfort and nostalgia should be prioritized over aesthetics — not that you can’t have both. So, it’s been refreshing to see that there’s been somewhat of an uptick in the desire for vintage-inspired Christmas decorations this year. One place that’s a treasure trove of cozy holiday adornments is QVC. You can specifically find a lot of pieces from heritage brands like MacKenzie-Childs and Lenox, the brand behind this jolly little snowman figurine. Whether you’re looking to spruce up your fireplace mantel or you know someone who loves to collect seasonal tchotchkes, the snowman is a solid pick. Even better still, it’s on sale as part of QVC’s Black Friday promotions, meaning you can score it for $40! Just be sure to do so while it’s still available, as it’s in high demand.

What Is the Lenox Happy Holly-Days Lit Snowman?

The Happy Holly-Days snowman is small, although not quite as small as the photo might suggest. At 8 inches tall, it takes up a good chunk of space without being too large for a side table or kitchen countertop. Its height, coupled with the attached pre-lit Christmas tree, allows the snowman to make a statement no matter how flashy the rest of your holiday decor is. If you’re wondering why the figurine’s price is perhaps a tad high, that’s in part because it’s made of Lenox’s signature porcelain material, which will hold up after years of use as long as you take proper care of it. Additionally, this piece is a collectible, as revealed by numerous QVC reviewers who say they buy Lenox figurines in multiples. Deputy Commerce Editor, Alicia, said her own mom collects snowmen figures, which explains why this one caught her eye. “My dad, sister, and I have bought her several snowmen from Lenox over the years,” Alicia said. “This one might just find its way under the tree this year — especially because my mom loves cardinals. It’s such a nostalgic gift for me TKTKT.”

Indeed the snowman is differentiated from others in its category, thanks to a cute little cardinal on its hat. You’ll also be happy to learn that its built-in Christmas tree lights stay lit for up to six hours at a time, before shutting off automatically for 18 hours. Just be sure to insert 2 AAA batteries, and you’ve got a piece of decor that literally dazzles!

What QVC Reviewers Are Saying

“I collect snowmen and love Lenox pieces. I already own this one and bought a second one for a gift. I like porcelain pieces versus resin.” —Jetty

“This little guy is just adorable! He’s got a very jolly smile and is a perfect size for a counter, side table, or windowsill.” —DC1619

“Bought this for my mother, who loves birds and snowmen, for her November birthday to use this Christmas. She hasn’t seen it yet, but will love it. Lenox never disappoints.” —MountainMike

According to QVC’s website, more than 24 of these snowmen have sold in the past two days, so there’s no telling how much longer they’ll stay in stock. Grab one while it’s still on sale, and maybe grab another for the most enthusiastic holiday decorator on your shopping list.

Buy: Lenox Happy Holly-Days Lit Snowman, $39.98 (normally $49)
